text: John Edward Walsh (born November 3, 1960) is an American politician and former military officer. He was a United States Senator from Montana from 2014 to 2015. He is a member of the Democratic Party. He was the 34th Lieutenant Governor of Montana from 2013 to 2014 under Governor Steve Bullock. Kristin Price, Beartooth NBC, New Adjutant General , March 8, 2012.Martin J. Kidston, Helena Independent Record, New Adjutant General set to Take Command of Guard, September 5, 2008. In October 2013, Walsh announced his candidacy for the U.S. Senate in 2014 to replace Max Baucus.Blake, Aaron, "Montana Lt. Gov. John Walsh (D) to run for Senate", The Washington Post, October 3, 2013. Retrieved 2014-08-07. In August 2014, he dropped out of the race after The New York Times reported he had plagiarized parts of a research paper he had written at the Army War College in 2007. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Lieutenant Governors of Montana Category:United States senators from Montana Category:People from Butte, Montana Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: John Walsh (Montana politician)
